text: The Kazakhstani Figure Skating Championships are the annual figure skating national championships held to crown the national champions of Kazakhstan. Skaters compete in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing, across different levels. Not every event has been held in every year due to a lack of entries. In some years, guest skaters from neighbouring countries, such as Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan, are allowed to compete in the event. ==Senior medalists== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !
